title: The Babadook
review: This is good, and by that I mean: it's very unpleasant to watch all the way through. Just really harrowing. Every single character is terrible in their own way. It's a shame we never get to see what the Babadook wants or why it chose that family. But I guess it's meant to be a metaphor for mental illness or grief and it didn't have an agenda. I found it scary.
